welcome.title: Welcome to CptWesley's Minimap
welcome.primary: Launch New World to access the minimap.
welcome.settings: You may also access the application settings while the game is not running.
welcome.discord: Feel free to join our Discord server for questions, help, and suggestions you might have: <1>{{discord}}<1>.
welcome.devBuild: This appears to be a development build. Use the button below to access the minimap at a debug location.

settings.title: Settings
settings.open: Open this menu at any time by right-clicking.
settings.advancedTooltip: Settings for advanced users. Only change them if you know what you are doing.

window.transparentHeaderTooltip: Makes the window header transparent when the map is displayed.
window.showHeaderTooltip: Show the header text and buttons when the map is displayed.
window.zoomLevelTooltip: Determines the zoom level of the map. Lower zoom may impact performance negatively.
window.townZoomTooltip: Enabling will allow you to configure a seperate zoom level when in towns.
window.townZoomLevelTooltip: Determines the zoom level of the map when in towns. Lower zoom may impact performance negatively.
window.iconScaleTooltip: Determines the size of the rendered icons.
window.showTextTooltip: Controls whether text is displayed underneath icons on the map. Enabling may impact performance negatively.
window.animationInterpolationTooltip: Detemines which algorithm to use for animations. Interpolation gives the smoothest results, but adds a delay to your position. 'None' gives the best performance.
window.extrapolateLocationTooltip: Determines if the player location is extrapolated. May result in unexpected movement.
window.resamplingRateTooltip: The number of samples taken when performing inter/extra-polation. A higher value will give a smoother experience, but has worse performance.

overlay.compassModeTooltip: Enabling will make the player always face north and rotates the map around the player, like a classic minimap.
overlay.opacityTooltip: Determines the opacity of the overlay. This setting might impact your performance significantly.
overlay.shapeTooltip: Determines the shape of the overlay.

icon.toggleShowLabel: Toggle whether this icon's label is shown

friend.shareLocationTooltip: Share your in-game location with any player that has your code.
friend.friendCodeTooltip: Send this code to your friends to share your location.
friend.friendsTooltip: List of your friends. One friend code per line.
friend.regenerate: Generate a new friend code if you don't want to let certain people trace you any longer.
friend.customServerUrlTooltip: The URL of the server endpoint that you want to connect to. Leave blank for default server.
friend.privacy: All data is stored temporarily. Data is either replaced by new data or deleted automatically after 30 seconds. The transmitted data is solely used to be transmitted to people that know your friend code. Data is only sent when the setting is enabled.
friend.unhashedFriendCode: Your unhashed friend code is '{{code}}'. Keep this a secret.
friend.friendsPskTooltip: The pre-shared key that is used to encrypt location data. Share this with friends, so they can see your data. Leave empty to disable.
